src:
Hasil Bola Ahad Dinihari: Liga Spanyol, Liga Inggris, Liga Italia
02 Nov 2019, 23:11 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Hasil bola pada Sabtu malam hingga Ahad dinihari, 3 November 2019, menyajikan rangkaian pertandingan menarik dari Liga Inggris, Liga Spanyol, dan Liga Italia.
Simak ringkasannya:

Liga Inggris

Hasil Liga Inggris pekan ke-11 pada Sabtu malam hingga Ahad dinihari, 3 November 2019, menyajikan kemenangan Liverpool, Manchester City, dan Chelsea. Manchester United kalah, sedangkan Arsenal hanya bermain seri.
Liverpool menang 2-1 saat berlaga di kandang Aston Villa. Tertinggal oleh gol Trezeguet (menit 21), The Reds berbalik unggul lewat gol Andy Robertson (87) dan Sadio Mane (90).
Liverpool, yang belum terkalahkan, tetap mapan di puncak klasemen dengan nilai 31 dari 11 laga. Mereka unggul 6 poin dari juara bertahan Manchester City yang ada di posisi kedua.
Man City sendiri mampu menang 2-1 saat menjamu Southampton pada pekan ke-11 ini. Sempat kebobolan oleh gol James Ward Prowse (13), The Citizens memastikan kemenangan lewat gol Sergio Aguero (70) dan Kyle Walker (86).
Pada laga lain, Chelsea menang 2-1 di kandang Watford. Gol The Blues diceploskan Tammy Abraham (5) dan Christian Pulisic (55). Adapun gol Watford dicetak Gerard Deulofeu dari titik penalti (80).
Chelsea kini menempati posisi ketiga klasemen dengan nilai 23, sedangkan Watford tetap di dasar klasemen dengan nilai 5.
Pada pertandingan lain, Manchester United takluk 0-1 saat bermain di kandang Bournemouth. Gol Joshua King (45) membuat MU melorot ke urutan ke-10 klasemen dengan nilai 13, tertinggal 3 poin dari lawannya yang ada di posisi ketujuh.
Arsenal juga gagal meraih poin penuh pada pekan ini. Mereka tertahan 1-1 saat menjamu Wolverhampton. Gol Arsenal dicetak Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (21), sedangkan gol lawan diceploskan Raul Jimenez (76).
The Gunners kini menempati posisi kelima klasemen dengan nilai 17, unggul lima poin dari Wolves yang ada di posisi ke-11.
Hasil Liga Inggris pekan ke-11AFC Bournemouth 1 - 0 Manchester UnitedArsenal 1 - 1 Wolverhampton WanderersAston Villa 1 - 2 LiverpoolBrighton & Hove Albion 2 - 0 Norwich CityManchester City 2 - 1 SouthamptonSheffield United 3 - 0 BurnleyWest Ham United 2 - 3 Newcastle UnitedWatford 1 - 2 Chelsea.

Liga Spanyol

Barcelona dan Real Madrid sama-sama gagal meraih poin penuh dalam lanjutan Liga Spanyol pekan ke-12, Ahad dinihari WIB, 3 November 2019. Barcelona takluk 1-3 di kandan Levante, sedangkan Real Madrid bermain 0-0 saat menjamu Real Betis.
Barcelona rugi dua kali saat menyambangi Levante. Selain kalah 1-3, mereka juga harus kehilangan Luis Suarez yang mengalami masalah dengan betis kanannya di babak pertama.
Dalam laga di Ciutat de Valencia itu, Barca tampil kedodoran. Sempat unggul lewat penalti Lionel Messi di menit 38, Barcelona kemudian kebobolan oleh gol Jose Campana (61), Borja Mayoral (63), dan Nemanja Radoja (68).
Barcelona masih memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 22 dari 11 laga, sama dengan Real Madrid yang berada di bawahnya. Namun posisi keduanya bisa disalip Granada, yang hanya terpaut dua poin akan melawan Real Sociedad, Senin dinihari nanti.
Selain Barcelona dan Real Madrid, dua tim unggulan lain yang bertemu, Atletico Madrid dan Sevilla, hanya bisa bermain 1-1. Atletico kini berada di posisi ketiga dengan nilai 21, sama dengan Sevilla yang ada di bawahnya.
Hasil Liga SpanyolRCD Espanyol 1 - 2 Valencia Levante 3 - 1 BarcelonaSevilla 1 - 1 Atletico MadridReal Madrid 0 - 0 Real Betis.

Liga Italia

Juventus dan Inter Milan sama-sama berhasil meraih kemenangan dalam rangkaian pertandingan Serie A Liga Italia pekan ke-11, Ahad dinihari WIB, 3 November 2019. Juventus menang 1-0 di kandang Torino, sedangkan Inter Milan mengalahkan tuan rumah Bologna 2-1.
Juventus tampil mengandalkan Cristiano Ronaldo pada laga di kandang Torino, Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. Mereka sempat kesulitan membobol ketatnya pertahan lawan. Si Nyonya Tua baru bisa menjebol gawang lawan pada menit ke-70 lewat gol Matthijs De Ligt.
Hasil ini memastikan Juve tetap memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 29 dari 11 laga. Mereka unggul satu poin dari Inter Milan.
Inter sendiri berhasil membawa pulang tiga poin dan menang 2-1 saat bertandang ke markas Bologna. I Nerazurri tertinggal lebih dahulu olh gol Roberto Sorian, tapi kemudian unggul berkat dua gol Romelu Lukaku.
Pada laga lain, AS Roma mengalahkan Napoli 2-1. Gol Roma dicetak Nicolo Zaniolo dan Jordan Veretout (penalti), sedangkan gol Napoli diceploskan Arek Milik.
Roma kini naik ke posisi ketiga klasemen dengan nilai 22, sedangkan Napoli berada di urutan keenam dengan nilai 18.
Hasil Liga Italia pekan ke-11Roma 2 - 1 NapoliBologna 1 - 2 InterTorino 0 - 1 Juventus.
text:
Sunday Morning Results: Spanish League, English League, Italian League
02 Nov 2019, 23:11 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The results of the ball on Saturday night until Sunday morning, 3 November 2019, presented a series of interesting matches from the English League, Spanish League and Italian League.
Check out the summary:

Premier League

Premier League results of Week 11 on Saturday night until Sunday morning, November 3, 2019, presents the victories of Liverpool, Manchester City and Chelsea. Manchester United lost, while Arsenal only played series.
Liverpool won 2-1 while competing at home to Aston Villa. Left behind by Trezeguet's goal (minute 21), the Reds turned ahead through goals from Andy Robertson (87) and Sadio Mane (90).
Liverpool, unbeaten, remain firmly on top of the standings with 31 points from 11 matches. They are 6 points ahead of defending champions Manchester City in second place.
Man City alone was able to win 2-1 at home to Southampton in this 11th week. Had conceded by goals from James Ward Prowse (13), The Citizens ensure victory through goals from Sergio Aguero (70) and Kyle Walker (86).
In another match, Chelsea won 2-1 at home to Watford. The Blues' goals were scored by Tammy Abraham (5) and Christian Pulisic (55). The Watford goal was scored by Gerard Deulofeu from the penalty spot (80).
Chelsea now ranks third in the standings with a value of 23, while Watford remain at the bottom of the standings with a value of 5.
In other matches, Manchester United defeated 0-1 while playing at home to Bournemouth. Joshua King's goal (45) made MU slipped to 10th place with 13 points, 3 points behind seventh-placed opponents.
Arsenal also failed to win full points this week. They were held 1-1 when entertaining Wolverhampton. Arsenal's goal was printed by Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (21), while the opponent's goal was struck by Raul Jimenez (76).
The Gunners now occupy fifth place standings with a value of 17, five points ahead of Wolves who are in 11th position.
Premier League Results Week 11AFC Bournemouth 1 - 0 Manchester UnitedArchant 1 - 1 Wolverhampton Wanderersston Villa 1 - 2 Liverpool Brighton & Hove Albion 2 - 0 Norwich City Manchester City 2 - 1 Southampton Liverpool United 3 - 0 BurnleyWest Ham United 2 - 3 Newcastle UnitedWatford 1 - 1 2 Chelsea.

The Spanish league

Barcelona and Real Madrid both failed to win full points in the Spanish League continued week 12, Sunday morning WIB, 3 November 2019. Barcelona defeated 1-3 at Levante, while Real Madrid played 0-0 at home to Real Betis.
Barcelona lost twice when visiting Levante. In addition to losing 1-3, they also had to lose Luis Suarez who had problems with his right calf in the first round.
In the match at Ciutat de Valencia, Barca appeared saggy. Got ahead through a Lionel Messi penalty on 38 minutes, Barcelona then conceded by goals from Jose Campana (61), Borja Mayoral (63), and Nemanja Radoja (68).
Barcelona still top the standings with a value of 22 from 11 matches, the same as Real Madrid under it. But the second position can be overtaken by Granada, who are only two points adrift of the match against Real Sociedad on Monday morning.
Apart from Barcelona and Real Madrid, the two other top teams that met, Atletico Madrid and Sevilla, could only play 1-1. Atletico is now in third place with 21 points, the same as Sevilla under it.
Spanish League ResultsRCD Espanyol 1 - 2 Valencia Levante 3-1 Barcelona Barcelona 1 - 1 Atletico Madrid Real Madrid 0 - 0 Real Betis.

Italian league

Juventus and Inter Milan both won the series of matches in the Italian League Serie A Week 11, Sunday morning WIB, 3 November 2019. Juventus won 1-0 at home to Torino, while Inter Milan defeated host Bologna 2-1.
Juventus appear to rely on Cristiano Ronaldo in the match at home to Torino, the Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. They had difficulty breaking into the tight defense of the opponent. The Old Lady can only break through the opponent's goal in the 70th minute through goals from Matthijs De Ligt.
These results ensure Juve still topped the standings with a value of 29 from 11 matches. They are one point ahead of Inter Milan.
Inter itself managed to bring home three points and won 2-1 when they travel to Bologna headquarters. I Nerazurri was left behind by Roberto Sorian's goal, but then went ahead thanks to two goals from Romelu Lukaku.
In another match, AS Roma beat Napoli 2-1. Rome's goals were printed by Nicolo Zaniolo and Jordan Veretout (penalty), while Napoli's goal was struck by Arek Milik.
Rome is now up to third place standings with a value of 22, while Naples is in sixth with a value of 18.
Results of the Italian League Week 11 Rome 2-1 Napoli Napoli 1-2 InterTorino 0-1 Juventus.
